entry.title: 在Android下运行Go语言程序
entry.content:
编译设置如下：

export GOARCH=ARM
export GOOS=linux
./all.bash

在Android下运行

adb pull x.out /data/local/tmp
adb shell
cd /data/local/tmp
./x.out

详细请参考《Go语言编程》

entry.title: Android开发的四款IDE
entry.content:
Eclipse+ADT

使用最多的。

ADT Bundle

等同于Eclipse+ADT，但是已经绑定好。

NetBeans+NBAndroid

在NetBeans上进行android开发的方式。

Android Studio

开发中，亲测，稳定性较差，稳定后应当很不错

entry.title: The Best Bible App I Found
entry.content:
I usually use this bible app. Yesterday, in my fellowship, Ms Zhang recommand me another one.

And when I download it, I found this bible app is very powerful and userful.

I support Android IOS and Win phone.And it has multive version bible to choose to show, commentaries, notes, and even mp3 file to listen.

In Chinese,”软件可以多版本同时显示、注释、查经资料、音频文件、书签、搜索功能。”

And extended files
